cab.content: Secret.^^^^^1108om Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India,M October 1919.(Repeated to Constantinople under Chiefs No. 76167.)(Received 9th.)13651 A.D. 6th October. Malleson wires, 6th October: " Report from Frontier to-day states Bolsheviks have further retired towards Askabad after defeat by (? Volunteers)."
